definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: He has bylined numerous magazine pieces.
sentences.chinese: 他给杂志写过许多篇署名的报道。

sentences.english: The letter was signed by Xiang Wenying from the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.
sentences.chinese: 这封的署名为新疆建设兵团的向问英。

sentences.english: The right of administrating information is the extension and development of the traditional signing right.
sentences.chinese: 权利管理信息权是传统署名权的扩张和发展。

sentences.english: Never write what you dare not sign.
sentences.chinese: 不要写你不敢署名的文章。

sentences.english: I had only the credit of servilely copying such sentences as I was ashamed to put my name to .
sentences.chinese: 我只是荣幸地恭录那些我羞于为之署名的语句。

sentences.english: Minutes of last meeting were approved and signed.
sentences.chinese: 会上署名通过前次会议记录。

sentences.english: This is a computer-generated form letter which requires no signature.
sentences.chinese: 这是一封由电脑造出的无需署名信。

sentences.english: Add clout by having a superior co-sign.
sentences.chinese: 引用上司的联合署名加以强调。

sentences.english: Never write what your dare not sign.
sentences.chinese: 不要写不敢署名的文章。

sentences.english: This small byline does the marketing for you.
sentences.chinese: 这个小小的署名是否销售给你。

sentences.english: Of course, the promise still has subscription rights.
sentences.chinese: 但承诺人仍享有署名权。

sentences.english: In a society where so many ache to be heard, a byline was better than money.
sentences.chinese: 在一个听到许多痛苦的社会，一个署名要比钱好的多。

sentences.english: He gave me a painting with his name subscribed.
sentences.chinese: 他送给我一张他亲笔署名的绘画。

sentences.english: Groove length uses end-of-track independently from time signature.
sentences.chinese: 凹线长度独立地使用结束轨道从时间署名。

sentences.english: Never write what you not sign.
sentences.chinese: 不要写你不敢署名的文章。

definition: inscription with name, date, or short sentence, on a painting, gift, letter etc
to carry a story/to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
to reply/to write back/letter written in reply/CL:封[feng1]
piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article
